parameters.name: DomainName
parameters.description: The accelerated domain name whose ICP filing status you want to update.

parameters.name: FuncFilter
parameters.description:
Specifies whether the feature that is specified by the FuncId parameter is enabled.

*   **config**: enabled
*   **unconfig**: not enabled

parameters.name: FuncId
parameters.description: The ID of the feature. For more information about how to query feature IDs, see [Parameters for configuring features for domain names](~~410622~~). For example, the ID of the origin host feature (set_req_host_header) is 18.

parameters.name: MatchType
parameters.description:
The type of the search. Default value: exact_match. Valid values:

*   fuzzy_match: fuzzy search.
*   exact_match: exact search.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. Default value: **1**. Valid values: **1 to 100000**.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page. Default value: **20**. Valid values: **1 to 500**.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource group.
